the reason there is no crack out yet is because u don't need one this patch is just a setting adjustment for better gameplay (and belive me they've done a bang up job) it does not touch the exe file the game works perfectly fine.

the reason why the patch didnt upgrade the exe for u is coz u didnt have ORIGINAL exe. Patch does update the exe, but only if u have the original one. So if u start the patched game with old exe u dont get all features of the patch, u still get some of them but not all. Also with old exe ppl get some wierd graphical bugs like black grass etc.

@Rango_q1
So sad it's not working. Try this:
- Rename .bin to .iso and see if you can open those.
- Use MagicISO to open the bin files
- Also IZArc and ExtractNow claim to support .bin archives. Try them if none works.
